name: City Builder-Mega Construction
description:
Ever wanted to become an Engineer, managing house construction projects.?
Well here is your chance, we bring you Mega City Construction, the most accurate and highly detailed accounting of construction of a house in the app store.
Drive 9 Amazing Mega Vehicles.
- Construction Heavy Truck
- Excavator
- Crane
- Bulldozer
- Forklift
- RoadPaver
- Sheep-foot Roller
- Dumper Truck
- Mixer Truck

Go through the steps of construction in a ordered sequence.
- Columns and caps
- Asphalting

Features
- Realistic Physics of all vehicles
- All phases of construction covered.
- Button/tilt and steering controls
- 15 Levels, Highly detailed
- Beautiful environments
